context_bundle.summary: Datadog: Commercial observability platform. Unified metrics, traces, logs. Key features: 600+ integrations, APM with auto-instrumentation, log management, synthetic monitoring, RUM, security monitoring, dashboards, alerting, SLOs. Agent-based collection.

onboarding.quick_start: Datadog: 1) Install DD Agent (K8s DaemonSet or host package), 2) Set DD_API_KEY, 3) Enable APM with DD_APM_ENABLED=true, 4) Add dd-trace library to app, 5) View in Datadog UI (APM, Infrastructure, Logs).
common_patterns: Unified tagging: env, service, version tags across all telemetry
APM: ddtrace-run python myapp.py for auto-instrumentation
Log correlation: Inject trace_id/span_id into logs
Custom metrics: DogStatsD for application metrics

known_errors.cause: Agent not running, API key invalid, or network blocked
known_errors.solution: Check agent status, verify API key, allow outbound to datadoghq.com
known_errors.prevention: Use agent health check, monitor agent logs
